scripts.install: [ -d node_modules/gulpsi ] && (_GULP=`command -v gulp` ; _BOWER=`command -v bower` ; [ "$_GULP" == "" ] && echo "gulp not installed, run: sudo npm install -g gulp" ; [ "$_BOWER" == "" ] && echo "bower not installed, run: sudo npm install -g bower" ; [ "$_GULP" != "" -a "$_BOWER" != "" ] && gulp bower && bower install && gulp build -m) || echo "WARNING: will not generate frontend in production mode"
scripts.watch: command -v nodemon 1>/dev/null && nodemon server.js || echo "nodemon not installed, please run: sudo npm install -g nodemon "
